body_html: I get the same after compiling pytorch+caffe2 with GPU support from scratch (NO_TEST=1 USE_FFMPEG=1 USE_OPENCV=1 USE_LEVELDB=0 USE_LMDB=1 python setup.py install) in a new anaconda environment. I get the segmentation fault after from caffe2.python import workspace (may be the same) and with import caffe2.python.core.

body: I get the same after compiling pytorch+caffe2 with GPU support from scratch (`NO_TEST=1 USE_FFMPEG=1 USE_OPENCV=1 USE_LEVELDB=0 USE_LMDB=1 python setup.py install`) in a new anaconda environment. I get the segmentation fault after `from caffe2.python import workspace` (may be the same) and with `import caffe2.python.core`.
